attributes.action: All MP S & Lords & prospective MP s to publish tax records from 2017
attributes.background: Due to the continual mistrust of politicians and there motives. It is essential to make their finances and motives more transparent Any MP s not doing so can step down at next election. ANY prospective MP s will know its a requirement. This can only enhance their credibility and be good for all.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't currently have the power to do this. If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require all serving MPs, parliamentary candidates and members of the House of Lords to publish their tax returns, you could start a new petition asking for that.
